title: Free Calls, Messages & International Calling
description:
Try our top-rated international calling app for free! Get lowest, cheapest rates for high-quality calls to any phone in the world.
Use Voxofon to talk, text, and share your life with your friends and family all over the world.
FEATURES
• Great international call rates – as low as 1 US cent per minute
• Top voice quality - crystal-clear HD voice calls
• Use WiFi or cellular to place calls or send texts
• Messages and SMS delivered instantly
• FREE calls and messages to other Voxofon app users
• Save up to 90% on your international calls vs. mobile carrier prices
Enjoy high quality cheap calls to any country in the world including India, Mexico, Guatemala, Nigeria, Colombia, Dominican Republic, Honduras, El Salvador, Ecuador, Cuba, Ghana, Jamaica, Kenya, Haiti, Ethiopia, and more.
CONVENIENCE FEATURES
• Use your existing Android contacts
• Cost of each call and text displayed before the connection is made
• Truly cross-platform - works on Android, iPhone, other smartphones, tablets, and computers
QUALITY, RELIABILITY AND TRUST
Voxofon is one of the most trusted applications for cheap international calling, with thousands of happy customers using it every day and recommending it to their friends. We are committed to high quality and responsive service.
